topic: Sanity check: next small step to reduce duplication
summary: Plan to add a pre-commit duplicate-content check to trading-platform by reusing existing CLI/util; update docs accordingly.

details.proposed_next_step: Wire a pre-commit hook in trading-platform that invokes scripts/find_duplicates.py and fails on duplicates; update README with install instructions. This reuses our existing utility and mirrors the pattern used in gpt-automation.
questions: Any objections to adopting the same duplicate-prevention hook pattern across repos?
Prefer hook to call Python directly or a short PowerShell wrapper for Windows?
